Una historia perfecta, con giros hasta el último momento. Sistema de juego a prueba de bombas con los plásmidos y el skyhook. Un estilo gráfico cautivador y colorista. Banda sonora increible...

Highly recommend. Great game, very enjoyable and although a different feel to the original and 2nd game, it's unique in itself. Also, if you're reading this and the christmas sale is still on buy the triple pack! Cheaper buying all 3 games compared to just the original!

As someone who didn't really get on with the first two Bioshock games, I bought this in the autumn sale somewhat unsure of if the changes to the formula's of the first two games would be enough to make me actually play through the game. Well I'm glad I did as this was one of the best games I have played and those changes I mentioned before did make a big difference. Now when you die you don't have to worry about finding your way back to where you were which, for me, was a big put off from the previous games. As for the story and the much improved gameplay (in my opinion at least), I can't recommend this highly enough. I have just finished this and want to play through again straightaway and there hasn't been many games that I have felt like doing that in my lifetime of playing games, not just recently.

Probably one of the most fun Bioshocks compared to the others but...just as weird in the ending as the others. Multiverse to the extreme. 

Worth a playthrough but I'm glad I didn't pay full price. As with the other Bioshocks, I only ever seem to play them once.

The DLC is about just as weird. As with the other Bioshocks there never really is a happy ending.
Awesome
Fantastic

BioShock Infinite доказала,что игры подобного плана могут стать хитом без сетевой и кооперативного режима
Во-первых: дизайн уровеней великолепен,Колумбия захватывает дух своей проработкай и живой атмосферой,начало и до конца ты веришь в этот город и мечтаешь попасть туда,и взглянуть все своими глазами.

Bо-вторых:сюжет,который затрагивает темы религии,расисзма и т.д,похожа на книгу 19-20гг,она не отпускает тебя,застовляет тебя осмыслеть,насколько люди могут жестокими и алчными для достижения своих целей,и к чему может все это произвести в итоги

В-третьих:сами перестрелки,несмотря на то что игрок может нести два вида оружее-это не мешает получать удовольствие от стрельбы,благодаря,рейсам дающим быстрое перемещение,способностями и врагам которые очень разнобразные и нетупые,модернизация:оружея,силы и главного героя.

В-четвертых:сами персонажи очень харизматичные комсторк,букер,близнецы,ну и конечно же сама Элизабет 

В ИТОГИ:игра является одной лучших игр 2013г да и вообще одной из лучших игр уходящего поколения 10/10
Není to tak skvely zazitek jako Bioshock z Rapture, ale porad je to dobra hra.
Sim, um ótimo game.

This review will have spoilers in it. 
Narratively inconsistent, the writers couldn't pick a theme to focus on between Columbia's corruption and rampant racism and Elizabeth's power and the two did not mesh well. The racial implications alone of there existing a dichotomous Easy to Spot Racists and White Saviors proved that the writers were painfully ignorant about what racism actually looks like in the relevant modern world and even in early 20th century America. The racist caricatures and attempted "satire", when satire is supposed to expose the flaws and absurdity of the oppressor, not shove racist caricatures at me until I become uncomfortable became so overbearingly blunt and disgusting that I wasn't even halfway through the game before I uninstalled it. 
Hugely disappointing game on its own, even more so when comparing it to other games in the series. Gameplay offered nothing new or innovative that the other's didn't do better, the hand-waving of Vigor users being perfectly fine while splicers invariably develop an addiction was lazy and ignored the basic premise of the entire Rapture narrative, and the visceral satisfaction of decapitating white supremacists wore off fast when I was forced to participate in murdering a Black woman who was portrayed as equally evil to Comstock even though she was not at all on politically or socially or economically equal footing with him and had not systemically enslaved and oppressed people. It's as though it never occurred to the writers that people wouldn't relate to Booker overcoming his white guilt, because clearly all of their players are white men who need to be pandered to. Because slapping a fat Hispanic boy in a sombrero and a poncho and labeling him as part of the Foreign Horde is something Hispanic players encounter on a daily basis and we don't need "satire" to tell us how stupid it is when my dad got called a beaner by a customer at work. I regret buying this when it was on sale for $10, it wasn't even worth the spit I wasted cursing this abomination. I hope we get to see a return to Rapture one day and find out what happens with Eleanor or the world post-Rapture, but until then I am avoiding any future titles out of this series.
Das Spiel hat mich überrascht, da ich nicht damit gerechnet habe, das es so gut umgesetzt wurde.

Bioshock Infinite is a great game with lot's of good elements. The weapons and powers are fun to use and Elizabeth is the best sidekick you will ever find in a game. The story line is also pretty good however the end ruins the game in my opinion.

i'm only 7 hours into the game and i love it. One of the best Bioshocks yet, i love the feel of it and the storyline. Its not reptative at all and its not just another game were you shoot and go some place. I really love this game and i highly recommand it.
Excellent game all in all. Played through it twice and still enjoyed it entirely. It has an enthralling story and smooth combat. The AI was fairly good as well.

Amazing environments, wonderful characters, and the combat is absolutely killer! (no pun intended) I understand what all the bioshock hype is about; This game is spectacular! This year's holiday sale opened a tear for me towards a world where I purchased this game, and I don't ever wanna leave.
I have yet to play a bad Bioshock title. Infinite only continues this progression of excellence and is completely worth your time if you enjoy video games at all.

It's like Bioshock.  There is absolutely nothing wrong with the atmostphere, the graphics, and (most) parts of the gameplay, though many parts feel like a watered down (watered up?) version of elements from the first game.

There is a brief stealth section in the game for some reason.  


Somewhere online, before sitting down to play the game, I had read a review where the writer had praised the game's moral choice system for providing the "rewarding and deeply satifying" good ending that the first game had failed to deliver.  

Ha.
Had a great time playing this game. I highly recommend it.
Fantastic game! The developers twisted sense of hunour is evident through out. If you liked the first two you will like this one. Same game mechanics just a different environment. Three thumbs up.

I liked it. Lots of people don't. Pretty good story, although some questionable writing choices and seems kind of like they wanted to write two stories then squished them into one. Gameplay is okay. Vigors and skyrailing is fun, gunplay is so-so. Characters are very strong, and the best part about this game. There are also some pretty cool set pieces and amazing art style. I reccomend it for the story atmosphere and characters.

A good shooting game! Satisfying, balanced and challenging gun play.
Beautiful visuals, good animation, voice acting...
The story didn't appeal to me much, and the big surprise was pointless, until the point where you wanted to end the game.
The other gameplay elements other than shooting (like skylines, companion) are un-inspired and un-interesting.
Will I recommend this game? Yes - for the good FPS it is!
Not much (if any) replay value, but worth a single playthrough if you can get it cheap.

Honestly, it was a great game! Amazing visuals and a refresher to the franchise. Only downside is that the combat seemed slightly weaker than in previous installments. Still though, was well worth the time put in.
Hacía tiempo que no disfrutaba tanto un shooter.

Set in the underwater city of Rapture again our hero Booker Dewitt is now a phillip marlow type detective and the whole feel is that of a classic noir 50`s detective novel, Elizabeth returns and the search is on for the little girl he left behind some time ago. 

Ok so off we go, and the story is quiet compelling with a few twists and turns, a kind of Kubrick style Eyes wide shut party scene, some sneaking around and a bit of action. 

It does take a while to get going and with this DLC being only 90 minutes long you’re limited on time when the action does start happening. 

The graphics and feel of the content is superb with a very moody atmosphere and a number of tasks to complete, the combat seems improved on the original game yet still not overly exciting, I found it much easier to rush my enemies and melee them rather than trying to shoot them with any weapons or use my vigors. 

There are a number of puzzles to solve as we progress, finding things, unlocking doors, action is sporadic yet satisfying, and you still get to use the good old Skyhook, which I used for mainly bashing bad guys. 

Weapons are plentiful and vigors are also available as with the first game. 

Bioshock Infinite: Burial at sea is an interesting departure and entertaining, maybe a little on the short side gameplay wise, and with a shock ending that has me wanting to play the second half when its released, This DLC is definitely worth a play but don`t expect hours of gameplay or too much action

Absolutely amazing game. The graphics are incredible (if you're into that sort of thing), the gameplay is sharp, combat is so highly improved, and it's, simply put, got the best story I've yet seen in a video game. From the beginning, you can tell that the story was well thought out and works fantastically with the end, which is took me several hours to fully comprehend and grasp. This game rocks- Total and Infinite 10/10.

On a peine à croire qu'il s'agisse simplement d'un FPS tout ce qu'il y a de plus basique. Eh bien en effet, je le qualifierai plutôt de FPS-RPG, un peu à la Borderlands (autre chef d'oeuvre de chez 2K) : entre combats intenses et histoire pleine de rebondissements, avec quelques bonus secrets à découvrir, Bioshock Infinite vous donnera envie de rejouer, encore et encore, pour découvrir tous ses recoins et comprendre toutes ses vérités. A consommer sans modération, dans tous les mods de difficultés !

As a fan of the Bioshock series I came into this game with the expectation that it would be great, and it was. 

The graphics are beautiful, voice acting excellent, storyline is simply amazing and the game kept me entertained all the way to the end with a conclusion I thought was just brilliant. 

The only thing that I wish had been better was combat, I found the game to be far to easy. Most the enemies pose no challenge, and you are aided during combat with free health, power and ammo through the entire fight when you get low. Even though it was not challenging the game still provides a lot of fun and a rewarding journey, regardless if you played the previous Bioshock games or not.

Highly recommend.
A little short, but really cool. The ending's unexpected, but still cool.

Игра имеет очень неординарную смысловую окраску подталкивающюю задумать о некоторых вещах, так же на отличном уровне игра актеров, все голоса, диологи с чувствами (особенно понравился голос Элизабет). В общем игра на высшем сделана на высшем уровне, все сдлеано на отлично, я считаю что в нее стоит сыграть каждому.
